overview: Rules are necessary for the development of a society, if they did not exist we'd miss the pleasure of breaking them A group of fresh-faced young students at an all-girls boarding school. A new girl arrives. A new friend will teach her how to breaking the rules set out by their strict headmistress. Rules broken include, sharing food in their dorms, swimming in the sea, using cutlery away from their purpose and, of course, wearing amazing shoes.
title: Breaking Rules
